_instructions.description: Personal Information Template for LinkedIn Job Application Automation
usage: 1. Fill in your personal information in the fields below
2. Remove or leave empty any fields you don't want to include
3. Save this file and import it using the Profile Manager
4. Use the GUI: Profile Manager → Personal Info tab → 'Load from File' button
5. Use the CLI: Profile Manager CLI → Option 6 → Import Personal Info

field_descriptions.name: Your full name as it appears on your resume (e.g., 'John Michael Smith')
field_descriptions.email: Your primary email address for job applications (e.g., 'john.smith@email.com')
field_descriptions.phone: Your phone number with country code (e.g., '+1-555-123-4567' or '(555) 123-4567')
field_descriptions.location: Your current location (e.g., 'San Francisco, CA, USA' or 'New York, NY')
field_descriptions.website: Your personal website or portfolio URL (e.g., 'https://johnsmith.dev')
field_descriptions.additional_urls: Any other professional URLs (portfolio, blog, etc.)

validation_notes: Email must be in valid format (contains @ and domain)
Phone numbers should include country code for international applications
URLs should start with http:// or https://
Location should be specific enough for job matching (city, state/country)
All fields are optional except name and email
_instructions.privacy_note: This file contains personal information. Keep it secure and do not share publicly.
